sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 深深浅浅的各种木槿色、丁香色、熏衣草色和紫色都是流行色。

sentences.en: Chinese perennial having mauve - pink to bright sky blue flowers in drooping cymes.
sentences.cn: 中国产的多年生罂粟,淡紫红色到亮丽的天蓝色花,下垂的聚伞花序.

sentences.en: Eurasian weed having yellow or mauve or white flowers and podlike fruits.
sentences.cn: 欧亚杂草开黄色淡紫色或白色花和承窝的果实.

sentences.en: I'm not sure black Is your colour , Capitaine. You could try mauve.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你穿黑色不好看,上校, 你该试试淡紫色.

sentences.en: If you shut it in glass, it would turn the glass mauve or violet.
sentences.cn: 如果你把它装在玻璃容器里, 它会把玻璃变成紫红色或淡紫色.

sentences.en: It is a custom to get married in a mauve dress.
sentences.cn: 穿紫红色衣服成亲是种风俗.

sentences.en: It is dangerous and terrifying to behold. It is also a rather interesting shade of mauve.
sentences.cn: 它躲在暗处，到处写满了它的危险和可怕，不过，它呈现的淡紫色到是相当有趣的。

sentences.en: Mauve, Rose _ shaped; stout, upright stems, short and thick narrow leaves in yellowish green, middle - late flowering.
sentences.cn: 紫红色, 蔷薇型. 颈粗直.柄短而粗.叶小而尖,黄绿色.株型半开张. 花期中晚.

sentences.en: Modulated colours from skin pink and paler shades to a more intense mauve.
sentences.cn: 调制出的颜色从肤色粉和浅黑色到更强烈的淡紫色.

sentences.en: Notice the mauve to pink homogenous intranuclear inclusions in the epithelial cells of the epidermis.
sentences.cn: 注意存在于表皮上皮细胞的淡紫色及粉红色的核内包涵体.

sentences.en: Pamela Tudsbury clattered away at a typewriter mauve evening dress and fancy hairdo.
sentences.cn: 色晚礼服,梳着别致的发式,正在打字机上咔嗒咔嗒地打着.

sentences.en: Pamela Tudsbury clattered away at a typewriter, in her mauve evening dress and fancy hairdo.
sentences.cn: 帕米拉·塔茨伯利穿着淡紫色晚礼服,梳着别致的发式,正在打字机上咔嗒咔嗒地打着.

sentences.en: Semidoublel orchid - mauve pansy. Variegated dark green and gold, plain; sucker propagation. Miniature.
sentences.cn: 半重瓣兰花色到淡紫色堇型花. 深绿色和金黄色组合成的一般型斑叶, 只能用 侧芽 繁殖. 迷你型.

sentences.en: Silver Premo or Sculpey with a tiny piece of Violet added for a beautiful silver mauve.
sentences.cn: 银色加上一点紫罗兰可以创造出非常漂亮的浅紫色.
花朵是珍珠般的淡紫色。

sentences.en: The ladies who you work for, after they sob for hourson end, make them use blue or mauve eyeliner to make their bloodshot eyes lookwhiter.
sentences.cn: 如果你的女雇主一连抽泣了几小时，就让她们用蓝色或是淡紫色的眼线，这能让充了血的眼睛看起来白一点。

sentences.en: We have no idea what mauve is.
sentences.cn: 紫色就是紫色,我们不知道什麽叫做淡紫色.

sentences.en: You’ll find their uniforms tend to be more subdued pastel colours, such as mauve, green or blue.
sentences.cn: 你会发现，他们的制服往往是较柔和的淡色彩，例如淡紫色、绿色或蓝色。

words.tran_cn: 淡紫色；苯胺紫；淡紫色染料

trans.tran_cn: 淡紫色；苯胺紫；淡紫色染料
